System Requirements

An explanation of typical hardware classes and setups. It would be nice to have a few example scenarios to determine what kind of performance to expect and what kind of hardware setup to plan for, given a bunch of usage scenarios

  • For a datacenter that hosts thousands of virtual machines?

  • For photo/video editing with up to 10 simultaneous users?

  • For your small office document storage…?

  • Any better examples?
